body.p: The different approaches have led to different accounting outcomes, in particular:

li.p: in accounting for premiums paid in excess of the value of the identifiable net assets;
in capitalising or expensing acquisition-related costs; and
in accounting for deferred tax assets and deferred tax liabilities that arise from the initial recognition of assets and liabilities.
